text: Saradhi Studios Entrance Saradhi Studios is the first studio established in Hyderabad, after the formation of Andhra Pradesh state. The first movie pictured in this studio is Maa Inti Mahalakshmi directed by Gutha Ramineedu.http://www.totaltollywood.com/articles/history/index.php?id=4 ==Films shot== # Raithu Bidda (1939) # Panthulamma (1943) # Mayalokam (1945) # Gruhapravesam (1946) # Anta Manavalle (1954) # Rojulu Marayi (1955) # Peddarikalu (1957) # Kumkuma Rekha (1960) # Kalasivunte Kaladu Sukham (1961) # Atma Bandhuvu (1962) # Murali Krishna (1964) # Preminchi Choodu (1965) # Navarathri (1966) # Bangaru Gajulu (1968) # Aatmiyulu (1969) # Annadammula Savaal (1978) # Iddaru Asadhyule (1979) # Seethe Ramudaithe (1980) # Radha Kalyanam (1981) # Pelli Choopulu (1982) # Moodu Mullu (1983) # Jailu Pakshi (1986) # Yeswanth varma (2015) # Janatha Garage (2016) #oka chance (2016) #Yatra (2018) ==References== ==External links== * Saradhi Studios at IMDb. title: Saradhi Studios
